explanations.machine learning: The paper mentions the use of a neural network embedding model to detect changes in companies' 10-Ks, which falls under the broader category of machine learning.
explanations.neural network: The paper explicitly states the use of a neural network embedding model for detecting year-on-year changes in companies' 10-Ks.
explanations.deep learning: The use of neural network embedding models is indicative of deep learning techniques being employed in the study.
explanations.representation learning: The neural network embedding model used to detect changes in textual content involves learning representations of the text, which is a form of representation learning.
